availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Unity Kenedy Sizemore. Father of Anderson Sizemore, James Sizemore, Lydia Sizemore, George Sizemore, John Sizemore, Nancy Rebecca Sizemore, Westwood Bouden Sizemore, and Sarah Susan Sizemore. Farmer in Christian County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Christian County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, District 1, p. 466B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Christian County, p. 603.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #19602.
